sentences.en: First lieutenant: Be who teaches you such style magisterial?
sentences.cn: 中尉: 是谁教你这样称呼长官的?

sentences.en: He talked with the magisterial authority of the head of the family.
sentences.cn: 他说起话来带着一副一家之主的口吻。

sentences.en: Magisterial the arrow injury that asked a surgeon to treat him.
sentences.cn: 长官请了一位外科医生来治他的箭伤.

sentences.en: Magisterial: " If resemble you such, how will produce a war do? "
sentences.cn: 长官: “ 如都像你这样, 将来发生战争如何办? ”

sentences.en: Mr Sen's latest book answers both difficulties in magisterial style.
sentences.cn: 而他最新发表的书以权威的方式回答了这些难题.

sentences.en: Not a little while, magisterial call authority: " Jump! "
sentences.cn: 不一会儿, 长官叫大家: “ 跳! ”

sentences.en: She would appear on the porch and reign over the street in magisterial beauty ( Harper Lee )
sentences.cn: 她会出现在阳台上,以她雍容之美成为注目的焦点 ( 哈珀李 )

sentences.en: She would appear on the porch and reign over the street in magisterial beauty.
sentences.cn: 她会出现在阳台上,以她雍容之美成为注目的焦点.

sentences.en: The Cambridge World History of Human Disease is a magisterial work.
sentences.cn: 《剑桥世界人类疾病史》是一部权威著作。

sentences.en: The colonel's somewhat in a magisterial manner.
sentences.cn: 上校多少有点威严的神态。

sentences.en: The report is magisterial, I got sore throat, cannot go back on time.
sentences.cn: 报告长官, 我得了咽喉炎, 不能按时回去了.

sentences.en: The soldier says: " The report is magisterial, my father is a general. "
sentences.cn: 士兵说: “ 报告长官, 我爸爸是将军. ”

words.tran_cn: 有权威的；专横的；官吏的

trans.tran_cn: 有权威的，威严的，地方法官的，硕士的
trans.tran_en: a magisterial way of behaving or speaking shows that you think you have authority
